title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the foundation for the authority of the TSA (a division of the Department of Homeland Security) for developing screening policies.

For Task A2, the response must explain how the implementation of these security policies may impact civil liberties.

For Task B, the response must explain how the scenario illustrates the role of civil servants in the federal government.

For Task C1, the response must describe an action a Congressional committee could take if passengers object to the policies detailed in the scenario.

For Task C2, the response must explain how these actions could impact the future implementation of TSA security policies.
